so spring break was fun.. like two weeks ago.

  Went to st. augustine with aaron, where we met up with rachel, friend mia, and teresa from UF.  camped there, went to the beach. my shorts fell off in the surf. it was awesome. later saw the fort and historic downtown. contemplated the rightness of toppling statues of european explorers. stole some kisses in the oldest cathedral in north america. was nice.

from there we went to orange park, where hotel rooms were to be found in abundance, when compared to the situation in st. augustine. saw some cools shops. bought a case of pinot grigio.

from there, we said later dude to captain aaron and the four of us rode down to rachel's in west palm and dropped teresa at her place.  endured a little sitdown dinner with her mom, which was cool. her dad looked at me this time, which was nice. 

rachel and mia stayed in wpb after having dropped me at the tri-rail. rode that down to hialeah. dusted off some very rusty espanish to use on a cab driver. borrowed his cell. got me a ride from my brother.  

spent the next few days lounging with the fam. dad's doing better, staying active with real estate and stuff, with a whole lot of help from my brother.  my fat dog is losing hair in that one spot on her back. my cat is still crazy. 

came back up with jordan austin on thursday to work on a paper. ended up goofing off a whole lot instead, but I did manage a good start on that thing at least. 

since then I've missed going to st. george, made out some, gone to st. george, picked up some hours at work for the jaxx really wants to do a biking tour of europe this summer fund, written some awesome papers, banged out some awesome exams, fallen asleep in class - a lot, written some okay papers, gone underground with rachel, kicked aaron's dog, written and not sent some post cards.. you get the idea. 

anyway party at my place on lipona two fridays from now I think, april 2nd. be there and be square. as soon as roommate katie busts out with the best theme possible, I'll wait two weeks, then post it here.
